explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) techniques, including machine learning, for building predictive models in the financial sector.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions Support Vector Machine (SVMs) as one of the black box models used in financial applications.
explanations.SVM: The paper mentions Support Vector Machine (SVMs) as one of the black box models used in financial applications.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions Neural Networks (NNs) as one of the black box models used in financial applications.
explanations.deep learning: The paper discusses the use of AI techniques, which can include deep learning, for building predictive models in the financial sector.
